compatibility.notes: Parit-6.0.0 allows for weak copyleft, meaning that while modifications to the original code must remain under the same license, it can be combined with other licenses without imposing the same restrictions on the entire work.

key_requirements: Publish all contributions in the preferred form for making changes.
License contributions not already licensed to the public on terms as permissive as this license.
Stop any infringing activity within 30 days of learning about it.
license.name: Parity-6.0.0
obligations: Contribute changes and additions made to the software.
Contribute any other software combined with this software.
Contribute software developed, deployed, monitored, or run with this software.
Provide the text of this license to everyone who receives a copy of the software.
